author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Veon Announces Withdrawal Of Mandatory Tender Offer In Relation To Global Telecom Holding
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - VEON LTD:
* ANNOUNCES WITHDRAWAL OF MANDATORY TENDER OFFER IN RELATION TO GLOBAL TELECOM HOLDING S.A.E.
* VEON ANNOUNCES WITHDRAWAL OF MANDATORY TENDER OFFER IN RELATION TO GLOBAL TELECOM HOLDING S.A.E.
* ‍DOES NOT INTEND TO PROCEED WITH ANOTHER MTO AT THIS TIME​
* HAD APPLIED TO EFRA FOR A MTO FOR ANY AND ALL SHARES OF GLOBAL TELECOM HOLDING S.A.E. NOT OWNED BY VEON Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
